Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Hey Oscar, big Will and Grace fan huh?

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: No. Everybody assumes I am. I always get them as gifts.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Oh.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Dunder Mifflin is having our first own garage sale. Like many Americans, we realized we had a lot of things that we really didn't need. And 10 cents of every dollar is going into the party fund so we can throw parties for ourselves.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: People! Look alive. It's showtime. Doors open in 3...2...1.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh, yikes.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: It's cold Dwight. Just shut the door and let people come in the front.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: It's good that its cold it will drive business inside.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: The signs will drive people inside.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: The warmth will lure people inside.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Close it.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: This is how business...

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Close it.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I'm not closing the door.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Close it. [starts wrestling Dwight]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Stop it.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Just close it.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Uh oh, looks like someone's sign is a little crooked. Uh, looks awful. Need a thumb tack?

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: Sure.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Not so fast.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Schrute's are farmers by hobby, and traders by trade. Through the art of the swap, I will walk out of this garage sale with the finest item here.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I will trade you for the used candle.

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: Forget you.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Come on, its trash, like your sign, unless you have this.

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: Fine, just give it.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: That's how it's done.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Woah, I love her. How much for that?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I uh... I actually don't know why I brought that because It's kind of priceless.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: 10 dollars.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Mhmm, no I paid 500 dollars for that.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Get lost.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Damn it.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: That is how you do it.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: You know we don't have to sell that if you don't want to. If it's a problem with the neon I can have my neon guy take a look.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You know it's really more for a bachelor pad. I just want to get a fair price.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Well we could put it in storage... in case.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: In case... in case of what?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: You know... in case if something changes.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I don't have an in case. Do you have an in case?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Nope.

Quote.Speaker: Lady
Quote.Text: How much for the slip and slide?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Get lost.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [on phone] Yes, hello Mr. Flax this is Michael Scott, your daughter's boss. I am calling because I am going to have to fire your daughter Holly because she is such a terrible employee. I'm just kidding. I'm kidding. I'm actually calling because I'm in love with her. I love your daughter, and I have for some time. And I would like to discuss my intentions with you... which are to ask her to marry me. And I was just hoping you would give me your approval. And this isn't a joke. So call me back, when you get this. And I look forward to speaking. Thank you.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Are you serious? A half used candle? Get out of here Dwight. You're blocking my table with your giant body.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Oh, cause there's a huge line of people waiting in line who want your spinster chotskies.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Screw you man. People like my stuff.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: People like Ryan? Let me tell you about men like him. He comes over and you're like 'Hey baby let me light a candle' then you pull out this one half used and he's like 'Uh! Who else is she seeing? I better lock her down fast.'

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: You can take my Helen Fielding collection.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: And the Jennifer Weiner collection.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Oh my gosh, you have the Dallas board game?

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Yea when I was a kid I was on Dallas.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Really?

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Yea. When I was kid we missed our connecting flight and we spent the entire day on Dallas. Then we spent a week on Hawaii... I was in heaven.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: We should play it.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Well... there's no instructions.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: It's Dallas the game, we can figure it out.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Yea.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I'm pretty good at board games.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Well, shall we make it a little interesting?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Sure.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: What is this?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: How did those get out? I'm sorry.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Professor Copperfield's Miracle Legumes?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I was in Jamaica, and I got lost, and it was getting dark this one night and then out of nowhere with a cart and he's selling these. Dwight he's telling me things about myself that there's no way he could have known.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: That's a common swindlers trick.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Probably, probably. So I buy some, I turn the corner, I feel like an idiot, so I go back to get my money, he was gone.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: So you wanna sell me magic beans. [laughs]

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Correction. I do not want to sell you Professor Copperfield's Miracle Legumes.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Nice try. No. Correction. Terrible try.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Michael called Dad?

Quote.Speaker: Holly's Mom
Quote.Text: Your friend Michael, yes. What's going on?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Um, I think I know. But I'll sound stupid if I'm wrong but is Dad there?

Quote.Speaker: Holly's Dad
Quote.Text: Holly?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Hi Dad.

Quote.Speaker: Holly's Dad
Quote.Text: There was a program on TV about India.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Um, ok. Did you connect with Michael?

Quote.Speaker: Holly's Dad
Quote.Text: Wanna watch it?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: I... I'm not there Dad, I'm in Pennsylvania.

Quote.Speaker: Holly's Dad
Quote.Text: What are you doing there?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: I live here. Um, can I talk to you about Michael?

Quote.Speaker: Holly's Dad
Quote.Text: I'll, I'll put your mother on.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: No. No... no Dad.

Quote.Speaker: Holly's Mom
Quote.Text: Holly?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Mom, Dad can't seem to focus on a subject.

Quote.Speaker: Holly's Mom
Quote.Text: Don't you worry about him, he's got me.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Well who do you have?

Quote.Speaker: Holly's Mom
Quote.Text: I have your father. He's right here I'll put him on.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: No. Mom?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Oh, which one is decaf?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: [looks out window] Michael! Michael!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Hi.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Hi.. I was just coming out to see what you were doing and to maybe stop you.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh, you know what, you have a siphon? I think I'm gonna run out of gas.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Why do you need more gas?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Well, I'm writing a message.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Is it a good message or a bad message?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I'm asking Holly a question in fire.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Are you proposing!?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Maybe.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Wow.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Hey you know what? I've got gas all over my hands and my shoes. Would you light it? Would you do the honors please?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Yea. Yea no problem. [runs away]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Pam.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Yep.

Quote.Speaker: Micahel
Quote.Text: Could you light this please?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Michael, you've had two ideas today. And one of them was great. And the other one was terrible.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I am not in the mood for riddles pam.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: This is terrible.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No, this is romantic.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: You know what? I'm gonna get a hose. Then we'll talk about it. Ok we'll figure it out. Be right back. Just stay there.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Free sample?

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: My mom makes the best pesto in the world. And I always tell her 'Mom you should sell this, you'd make a fortune' and she always says 'No it's just for family.' Well finally I was like f*** it, I'll sell it so I'm like 'Mom, I need you to make a ton of pesto for a pesto party for all my friends' and she's like 'uh, ok' ... pesto party? Really? Anyway... she makes like a hundred bottles worth. It's so good. And Phyllis... just had that mom look I wanted.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: You got this kosher certified?

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: No I meant like uh, it's cool, its kosher, it's all good.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Ryan, you have such an interesting mind. So creative. All these new business ideas and artistic projects. [laughs]

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Thank you. Whatcha got there?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Oh, its just Stanley's old photo album. I'm thinking about throwing it in the garbage. I mean, why would I want some random black mans old photo album on my bookshelf. I'm not James Franco.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: things are going very well. I traded a thumb tack for Meredith's junk for Kelly's crap for Phyllis' garbage for Oscars trash for Stanley's garbage for Ryan's junk for Creed's garbage for a very cute squid that Erin happened to have.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Jim, put those away.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [pulls away beans] I'm really sorry. Pam must have put those out.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: just out of curiosity, what were the claims for those beans?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: They're legumes Dwight, and you're just gonna make fun of me, so why would I... You know what, this ends now. [crumples up beans, stomps on them, and throws them in a box]

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Hey Michael everyone's in the conference room.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Why?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: You called the meeting I don't..

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I did?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Ok. Thank you all for coming. I would like to talk to you all today about... recycling.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Michael.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yes.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: We are a family.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I could not have agreed with you more.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: And I've always believed that we should all be involved in everyone's personal lives, in a very major way.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yes. Thank you.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: So about this proposal thing...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No, no, no, no. My minds made up I am not going to change my mind you can't talk me out of it.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Michael, she's perfect for you.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: She's the one.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: She's amazing. This is very exciting.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: So we just... we wanna help you plan the proposal so that it's safe and responsible and realistic and doable.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I had a great idea until you ruined it.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Wanna know how to do it? Here's how you do it. Take her out to dinner. Go down on one knee. If you are in costume, you did something wrong. If at any point you find yourself tying a ring to a dogs collar, stop, and look at yourself.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [playing the Dallas board game] Hmm, I'm gonna play me a little ol' black mail card .

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Nice.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: And call a proxy meeting to take control of you and oil once and for all.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: No you cant do that. You cant play a black mail card and call a proxy meeting in the same turn.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Why not. Seems to me we're just making up rules cause somebody forgot to staple the rules to the inside of the game like a normal human being.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: And I'm gonna play this here share the wealth card.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Oooh.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Which entitles me to half of both of y'alls money so if you don't mind.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: no this card is from the wrong game this is from the game of life.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: It was in the box.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Well played.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Thank you.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: We must honorably adhere to the rules we are making up on the spot.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: No but that's not fair.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Well that's Dallas.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Dallas indeed.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: What... Ryan, where did you get this picture? [a picture of Oscar on Ryans bottles of salsa]

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: My mom also makes the best salsa.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: This is your moms old stuff?

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Yeah mostly.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: How's she doing?

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: It didn't go down so easy but she's made some friends and it's already better than it was.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: How do you know when its time?

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Uh I don't know if you ever know. And if you wait for the day when your parent to comes to you and says 'I cant take care of myself anymore' its never gonna happen. I have a box of bras under the table if you're interested.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Let me see.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Ok I think animals and proposals are out. Right Ryan didn't you read in one of your blogs that animals are out?

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Blogs are out but people are texting each other no more animals

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: How about this I throw a corpse dressed like me off of the roof, it hits the ground, the head pops off, this leads me to the line ' I lost my head when I fell in love with you.'

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: That's a guarantee.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: It's easy enough to get a corpse, you just go to a med school. I already have the ring.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Don't think you need the corpse then.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Heres the ring.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Holy s*** is that real?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yeah. I saved 3 years salary.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: No. [shakes head back and forth]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Is she not going to like that?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: No she's going to love it so I think you can keep the proposal simple. You know like when Jim proposed. He just he got down on one knee and he told me that he loved me and he asked me to marry him and it was perfect.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Where was that.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: At a gas station. [oscar laughs]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: At a gas station?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh it was when she was working in New York so it was halfway between both of us.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: That mush have been a surprise when... at the gas station you proposed.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: No it was really it was really sweet. It was raining and..

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh yea you didn't say that the weather was bad that sounds perfect. I want this to be an event that everyone talks about always and forever.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Totally reasonable.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I just... it's terrifying.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: She's not gonna say no.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I know but I'm still scared I don't know why.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Cause it's a big deal. I mean.. I knew Pam was gonna say yes but I was still scared.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: You were scared?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Yeah... it.s scary.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Get this... Kevin thought I was gonna sell my Bowflex for 200 dollars and I told him 'Dude this was a prop in my movie.'

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Look I need to talk to you.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Ok it's because we haven't sold anything. You know what? We just wait until the end of the day, people get desperate, and they're gonna pay anything.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: I think I need to go home to Colorado. My dad isn't doing so well.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh ok. For how long?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: I don't know.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Is he alright?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You ok?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Yeah, yeah it's just you know I don't want to go home when he's on his death bed you know, I wanna be there when he's still my dad.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yeah, yeah well you definitely need to do that.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: And I want you to come with me. Now I know that's a lot to ask of a boyfriend..

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Ok.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: And I was thinking... you know maybe since given our last conversation that we're both ready... Michael Scott will you..

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No, no, shhhhut it. Mhmm. Oh God. Nope, nope, nope.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Uh, what?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No. I am not going to be proposed to in the break room. That is not going to be our story. Mhm hm. Should have burned this place down when I had the chance.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Hey guys it's my turn.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: You cant go, you're dead, I shot you 5 moves ago.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Yeah I told you, you can't shoot people.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: I told you we're way past rules. We have been for some time now. We start having rules now, everything we built collapses.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: This is stupid and I want my money back. Where's the money?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Yeah where is it?

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Ok you know what? I am never ever playing board games with you two again.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: And that is Dallas. [shows money]

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Nice.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Not bad right. [swinging golf club]

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Can't really tell the...

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [to Dwight] Nice.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I know right...[sees Jim's beans] what the?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh my God.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: That... that's impossible.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: It is right. I mean, it's impossible.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: All right, I'll take them.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: They're probably worthless.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Probably. [walks away with beans]

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Leave the telescope.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I started with a thumb tack and traded my way to a telescope. But in a way the most valuable thing here wasn't the telescope at all. No, it was this... packet of beans. So I traded the telescope for it. And I can just go buy another telescope.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Hey, how'd we do?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: 13 dollars.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: That's great and we still have most of our stuff. Good.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Listen about earlier ...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No, no, no, no, lets not talk about that.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: It was wrong to put you in that position and... Michael you are my life now. I'm not going to Colorado.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Shhhh. Let's go on a little walk. You know what? I wanna show you some stuff.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: So this is one of my favorite places in the world.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Why?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: This is where Toby announced that he was going to Costa Rica. Happiest day of my life. Until the day you came to replace him. Let's go in here.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: This is where we first kissed.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: I remember.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: And this is where we first made love. Remember what I tried there?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Michael.. [they both laugh]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Through these blinds is where I first saw you, and you had all these boxes, and I thought you were the prettiest mover I had ever seen. And I was sitting at this desk when I called you to tell you that I had herpes and that I was still in love with you and you said that it was over, and that you didn't love me. Thank goodness none of that was true. Including the herpes.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Yes.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: In-grown hair.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Right in here... this is where we first co-ran our meeting. Remember, obesity awareness?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Mh hmm.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: We saved a lot of lives that day. That's where you first met Michael Klump.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Oh, I say, I say, I say I sit on you!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: And right over there is where you found out that Meredith was prostituting herself for Outback steak. And I will never forget that you had the cutest look on your face because you couldn't believe it, you thought it was so wrong.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: And over here..

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: What happened here?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Well, nothing. Nothing really. I would just find an excuse to come here so I could stare at you through that window. This is what I'd do. [runs water through hand]

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Nice

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Let's go in here.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: [everyone in the office is standing in the kitchen with a lit candle] Hi guys.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: This is where our love faces its toughest test. After this, its just smooth sailing for the rest of our lives.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Holly, will you marry me?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: Marry me Holly.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: That guy's got more than he can handle as it is.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Will you marry me?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: That marriage would be a sham.

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: Will you marry me?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Easy no.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Will you marry me?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: That would be hot. I would pay to see that.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Will you marry me Holly?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Only one that I was kind of worried about.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [the area where Holly's desk is is filled with lit candles] This is where I fell in love with you. And this is where I ask you to marry me. It started with.. [fire sprinklers go on] Holly Flax, marrying me will you be?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Your wife becoming me will I. [everyone in the kitchen starts cheering, then enters annex]

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: That's awesome!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Congratulations!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Congratulations!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Thank you. So guys, guys, guys. We're moving to Colorado.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: All of us?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yep.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Wait, what?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Holly has to go back to Colorado. I'm going with her. I'm leaving.
